title: Is becoming vegan a good or bad idea?
body:
Need these question answered

1.Does it reduce the risk of getting cancer, heart diseases and etc?
2.Do you have a longer life span from it?
3.Do you tend to become more active and excited?
4.Do you have less odor smell?
5.Is your body able to live without amino acid and protein for the rest of the life for being vegan? 
6.Is there anything bad about becoming vegan?
